Sentencas: Solid electrolyte materials based on bismuth vanadate (Bi4V2O11) exhibit 50-100 times more ionic conductivity than any other solid electrolyte materials which are in use in solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Effect of Cr3+ substitution for V5+ in bismuth vanadate solid electrolyte

Sentencas: Partially substituted trivalent Cr-doped Bi4V2-xMexO11-delta (Me = Cr-III) has been prepared by solid state reaction technique.
Titulo: Effect of Cr3+ substitution for V5+ in bismuth vanadate solid electrolyte

Sentencas: Three phases (alpha,beta,gamma) are observed in the unsubstituted compound.
Titulo: Effect of Cr3+ substitution for V5+ in bismuth vanadate solid electrolyte

Sentencas: Alpha (alpha) is the low conducting room temperature phase and gamma (gamma) is the high conducting phase observed at higher temperature.
Titulo: Effect of Cr3+ substitution for V5+ in bismuth vanadate solid electrolyte

Sentencas: Stabilization of alpha, beta and gamma phases at room temperature depends on the Bi:V ratio and the nature of the dopant.
Titulo: Effect of Cr3+ substitution for V5+ in bismuth vanadate solid electrolyte

Sentencas: These phases have been characterized by X-ray diffraction analysis.
Titulo: Effect of Cr3+ substitution for V5+ in bismuth vanadate solid electrolyte

Sentencas: All the substituted phases (0 <= x <= 0.4) retain the low conducting alpha-phase.
Titulo: Effect of Cr3+ substitution for V5+ in bismuth vanadate solid electrolyte

Sentencas: AC conductivity measurement of all the samples in the temperature range of 200 degrees-700 degrees C has been done.
Titulo: Effect of Cr3+ substitution for V5+ in bismuth vanadate solid electrolyte

Sentencas: The change of slopes observed in the Arrhenius plots is in agreement with the phase transitions for all the studied compositions.
Titulo: Effect of Cr3+ substitution for V5+ in bismuth vanadate solid electrolyte
